headline: Ares Management Corporation to Present at the Bank of America Securities 2026 Financial Services Conference

headline: Makarora Completes Acquisition of Plymouth Industrial REIT for $2.1 Billion
summary: NEW YORK, Jan. 27, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Makarora Management LP (“Makarora”) today announced that, together with Ares Alternative Credit funds (“Ares”), it has completed the previously announced acquisition of Plymouth Industrial REIT, Inc. (“Plymouth”) in an all-cash transaction valued at approximately $2.1 billion. Pursuant to the terms of the transaction, Plymouth shareholders will receive cash consideration of $22.00 per share. headline: HarbourVest Partners Closes Structured Solutions Vehicle for Private Market Secondaries
summary: BOSTON, January 27, 2026--HarbourVest Partners, a global leader in private markets investing, today announced the closing of HarbourVest Partners Structured Solutions 2025.
